buildFunctionURI

public URI buildFunctionURI(String fname)
Description copied from interface: MatchFunctRegistry

Creates a new URI which will be used to identified a registered function.

This is an utility method meant to be used to provide a standard namespace for all SAPERE custom functions.

Specified by:

Description copied from interface: MatchFunctRegistry

Creates a new URI which will be used to identified a registered function.

This is an utility method meant to be used to provide a standard namespace for all SAPERE custom functions.

buildFunctionURI in interface MatchFunctRegistry<com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.function.Function>
